message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $150 to you, but we're starting the negotiation at $120. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend closer to $100.  Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with $115. This allows us both to reach a fair agreement. Let me know what you think!
